```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

## pivot_longer

Load the PULSE data

```{r}
pulse_df = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") |>
  janitor::clean_names()
```

Wide format to long format...

```{r}
pulse_df_tidy = 
  pulse_df |>
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    values_to = "bdi_score",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_"
  )
```
